channel.title: Fedora Noir - The Fine Art of Wearing a Hat (Saturday 20th November)
channel.description:
*"The camera hows a face hidden in shadow. A match flares, lighting up the features for an instant. Smoke swirls away as the sun sets in the distance The Detective steps out of the shadows, their weary eyes looking out over the city. They put on a creased and faded Hat, and walk into the night.*
*It’s time to get to work."*
Link: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Ml6Au5MZlW4IyHqCFbG All Access Time: 7th October 2021
